QuestData.Title: Ghostbuster
QuestData.Description: See that hill just beyond our base camp? That's Largo's Overlook and it's not a fun place to setup camp next to. We have been dealing with those spirits and spectres ever since we setup base camp.$b$bCan you head up there and let them know we don't plan on leaving anytime soon? A few good kills on their ranks should put them in line.$b$bThanks for your help on this, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 14 ghosts of any type at Largo's Overlook, just northeast of base camp.
